mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(ca.cost_addition_id,'')id, IFNULL(ca.`name`,'')`name`, IFNULL(a.start_time,'')`star`, IFNULL(a.end_time,'')`end`, IFNULL(a.price,'')`price`, IFNULL(ca.pid,'')pid FROM t_cost c LEFT JOIN t_addition a ON a.cost = c.cost_id LEFT JOIN t_cost_addition ca ON ca.cost_addition_id = a.cost_addition WHERE a.cost=#{id}

SELECT IFNULL(l.`name`,'')`name`, IFNULL(c.collection_time,'')time, IFNULL(o.door,'')door, IFNULL(o.area,'')area, IFNULL(c.`total_prices`,'')totle, IFNULL(c.type,'')type, IFNULL(c.receipts,'')receipts, IFNULL(l.id,'')id, IFNULL(c.cost_id,'')costid FROM t_cost c LEFT JOIN t_office o ON o.id = c.office LEFT JOIN t_user_to_office t ON o.id = t.ofiice_id LEFT JOIN t_lessee l ON l.user_id = t.user_id LEFT JOIN t_office_building b ON b.id=o.office_building LEFT JOIN t_shared_office s ON o.shared_office_id=s.id WHERE 1=1
AND ( b.`name` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{condition},'%') OR s.`name` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{condition},'%') )
AND ( o.shared_office_id = #{id} OR o.office_building = #{id} )
AND o.door=#{door}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_cost c LEFT JOIN t_attention a ON a.attention_label = c.office WHERE a.attention_type = 'C' AND c.type=1 AND a.attention_user = #{id} AND DATE_SUB( NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY ) <= DATE( c.collection_time );

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_attention a LEFT JOIN t_office o ON a.attention_label = o.id LEFT JOIN t_cost c ON c.office=o.id WHERE a.attention_type = 'C' AND a.attention_user = #{id} AND c.type=1 AND PERIOD_DIFF( date_format(now(), '%Y%m'), date_format(c.collection_time, '%Y%m') ) = #{month};
